notificationPriceTypeScore1: Customers do not trust this seller. The rating is too low.
notificationPriceTypeScore2: Either reviews for this seller are controversial, or we have not enough information about the seller (the number of reviews is too low, etc.).
notificationPriceTypeScore3: Good rating. Get in touch with the seller and read reviews.
notificationPriceTypeScore4: Excellent rating! The seller can be trusted.
notificationPriceTypeFeedback1: The seller has little to none positive reviews.
notificationPriceTypeFeedback2: The seller has some positive reviews.
notificationPriceTypeFeedback3: The seller has mostly positive reviews.
notificationPriceTypeFeedback4: The seller is almost perfect according to the buyers' reviews!
notificationPriceTypeAge1: The seller works for less than a year.
notificationPriceTypeAge2: The seller works for more than a year.
notificationPriceTypeAge3: The experienced seller. Works for more than {{ years }} years.
notificationPriceTypeDescription1: According to the customers' reviews, the products do not fit the descriptions. It is better to search for more reliable sellers.
notificationPriceTypeDescription2: A lot of products do not fit the descriptions.
notificationPriceTypeDescription3: Some products do not fit the descriptions.
notificationPriceTypeDescription4: Most of the products fit the descriptions.
notificationPriceTypeDescription5: According to the customers' reviews, the products fit the descriptions.
notificationPriceTypeCommunication1: All customers are dissatisfied with the seller's communication.
notificationPriceTypeCommunication2: Most customers are dissatisfied with the seller's communication.
notificationPriceTypeCommunication3: More than a half of the customers are dissatisfied with seller's communication.
notificationPriceTypeCommunication4: Most customers are happy with the seller's communication and trust them.
notificationPriceTypeCommunication5: The customers consider the seller to be sociable and responsible. All answers to customers' questions are provided timely.
notificationPriceTypeShipping1: According to the customers' reviews, there are regular delays in shipment of orders.
notificationPriceTypeShipping2: Most orders are delivered with delays.
notificationPriceTypeShipping3: Some orders are delivered within the committed period.
notificationPriceTypeShipping4: Most orders are delivered within the committed period.
notificationPriceTypeShipping5: The customers are happy with the delivery speed.

letyshopsOptionsLabelShowPrice: Enable "Price dynamics" for products presented by AliExpress, Gearbest, Bangood, LightIntheBox, TomTop, MiniIntheBox
letyshopsOptionsLabelShowCashbackHints: Enable notifications about the shops providing cashback in Google search results
letyshopsOptionsLabelShowSimilarList: Enable "Similar products with cashback" for the products presented in the shops which are not providing cashback
letyshopsOptionsLabelShowPromoNotificati: Enable browser push notifications about promotions and special offers
letyshopsOptionsLabelShowUserNotificatio: Enable browser push notifications about cashback statuses
letyshopsOptionsAllowTabUrlCollectLabel: Enable access to the visited links
letyshopsOptionsAllowTabUrlCollectDescri: That is required for our extension to work correctly. Using your visited links our extension can help you to not lose your cashback and show tips regarding similar products and shops with cashback. These data are processed automatically by our system, are not saved anywhere, and are not transferred to any third-parties.
letyshopsOptionsAllowAnalyticsCollectLab: Please help us to personalize your shopping experience
letyshopsOptionsAllowAnalyticsCollectDes:
Please pay your attention that we use Google Analytics to improve our service and to be the best for your needs. 
Information about your online actions helps the extension to show targeted tips to you. These data are processed automatically, they are closed and can be used only for promotional purposes. We need them only to make your online shopping more comfortable.
notificationSimpleSimilarOffersText: Don't miss your chance to receive extremely increased cashback!

notificationSimilarPopupFooter: Please pay your attention that the prices can differ a bit due to some technical reasons

Using your visited links our extension can help you to not lose your cashback and show tips regarding similar products and shops with cashback. These data are processed automatically by our system, are not saved anywhere, and are not transferred to any third-parties.
